channel.title: Npc's
channel.description:
Im a good coder but can somone tell me how to add npcs i add the coding in the npc file with the like
spawn= 314 4 143 4 341343 all that stuff but how do i get them to come, after i complie with no errors everything else i added but the npcs are there, I do know how to make them talk

item.title: Npc's
item.dc:creator: @helldemond helldemond
item.description:
@helldemond wrote:

lol nope i own hellscape servers but the thing is its strange how they wont work now i add them in the folder and compile what else do i need to do,.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc's
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Paintball199:

O rely, ur a beginner coder if you dont know how to add npcs -.-

Java has very little to do with npc.cfg, its just a configurations file. Did you tab correctly and place the heightlevel and such at the right level? And you can be a good coder and not know anything about moparscape, there is java outside of moparscape.

Read full topic
